attributes.action: Understand that the taxpayers of this country WILL NOT be happy if you offer to pay for the World Cup and Olympics in Brazil.
attributes.additional_details: Our prime minister is so fundamentally out of touch with the people of this country that action has to be taken by somebody to ensure that he does not wander off into the ether and end up committing this country to ludicrous financial promises which he appears to suffer extreme difficulty over resisting on HIS world stage.
